jumbotron.h1: Welcome to the Boulder Bike Tour !

main: __i__ Month, __i__ DAYS, __i__ HOURS, __i__ MIN, and __i__ SEC

texts: The Boulder Bike Tour will start soon, and you have to subscribe now !
Here's a little description of this competition. You'll be seduced (trust me <3) and just subscribe without thinking ^^:

contest.h1: Would you like to participate to the construction of the slogan for the tour bike this year ?
contest.p: Just add your name, surname, email adress so that we can contact you if needed to announce that your slogan has been selected for example !!
No adds, no servey will be targetted to the email adress you fill here
